import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../css/GroupCard.css' import UserContext from '../utils/UserContext'; const GroupCard = ({group}) => { const { currentUser } = useContext(UserContext) const currentGroupIds = currentUser.groups.map(g => g.id) return ( <> {currentGroupIds.includes(group.id) ?

{group.name}

{group.description}

:

{group.name}

{group.description}

} ) } export default GroupCard
